scripts.build: riot --config riot.config.js src/tags/ dist/js/bundle.js && gulp build
scripts.gitignore:validate: npm run gitignore:generate && git add .gitignore && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || (echo Error: gitignore is not up to date && exit 1)
scripts.gitignore:push: npm run gitignore:generate && git add .gitignore && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit -m "A gitignore file automatically generated by script" && git push
